ModMetaData.name: [RF] Rational Romance ALL BISEXUAL

ModMetaData.description: [img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] This mod is forked from: https://github.com/emipa606/RationalRomance I do not own the original mod, this is just for fun for me, as I like the idea of a bi only romance mod. Contact the original modder for issues and suggestions.
